Package org.mixare.lib.marker.draw

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClickHandler
    A click validator class to handle the clicks on the core side, the plugin will create a click validator and send it to the core And the core will validate the click and then reacts on the click.
    DrawArrow
    A draw command that can be send by a plugin marker to draw an arrow on the client.
    DrawCommand
    This drawcommand class, can be implemented by subclasses that can draw items on the screen through the plugin.
    DrawImage
    A draw command that can be send by a plugin marker to draw an image on the client.
    DrawTextBox
    A draw command that can be send by a plugin marker to draw an textbox on the client.
    ParcelableProperty
    A draw property which contains a parcelable object with its classname so it can be loaded.
    PrimitiveProperty
    A draw property which contains a primitive value with its classname so it can be loaded.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PrimitiveProperty.primitive
